comment.body: Getting paid sounds great. Let me know if you find extra :-\ Thanks for what I'll take as a warning about bountysource(?)
I think it's rarely all reasonable. Companies want to keep or take every "right" they can possibly grab.

Don't leave me here alone with (\~\*)Publicality(~*)! Or however regex syntax works.
Actually I'm leaving too :P

@Znnex: Hahah that all got destroyed by markup/down/left/inward
Edit: fixed it, kinda!
Look out, it's the Superman of shitty retorts.

@caryoscelus: recaptcha :D The infinite ones Tor users get are the best. You get to sit and identify signs or buses or whatever until you give up. Or you starve, I guess. You're definitely not getting *through* them.

In this thread, someone asks for cross-platform libre software and people insist on everything else instead. You used Google once so you might as well switch to Windows and buy some corporate software that spies on you :)) Sorry I can't actually help, I just found that obnoxious. I don't think I found anything that worked better than VNC. It may depend on which platforms you want to use.
I'm waiting for the signed platinum collector's edition preorder.
